articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Southern Europe swelters under 'Cerberus' heat wave - DW (English)
articles.description: Italy, Greece and Spain are grappling with scorching temperatures, with most of Italy under a "red" alert warning for heat that could break records once again.
articles.content:
Southern European countries were reeling under heat wave "Cerberus" Thursday, with temperatures set to break records yet again.
The European Space Agency (ESA), whose satellites monitor land and sea… [+2640 chars]
